Company Name: National Metal Manufacturing and Casting Co (2220)
Description: National Metal Manufacturing and Casting Co (known as: Maadaniyah) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since September 2000. Maadaniyah operates within the Materials sector focusing on Steel. Maadan.iyah is based in Jubail, Saudi Arabia and was established in December 1990
